subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: If the seeds hold, Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova could celebrate their 10-year reunion at Wimbledon in the quarterfinals of the tounament, which begins Monday.
snippet: If the seeds hold, Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova could celebrate their 10-year reunion at Wimbledon in the quarterfinals of the tounament, which begins Monday.
